sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "

Suppose in the given figure, we have \(PQ \parallel NO \). It is given that 
\[
	MP = 6 cm
\]
\[
	NP = 3 cm
\]
\[
	NO = 10 cm
\]
Now, write down the values of
\[
	\frac{MQ }{QO }
\]
and
\[
	PQ 
\]
\newline
tikzpicture{}
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": " Since the line segment PQ is parallel to side NO , we can write 
\[
	\frac{\input[s1v1]{}Q }{QO } = \frac{MP }{\input[s1v2]{}N } = \frac{6 }{3 } = 2.0
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Now, in the triangles MPQ and MNO we have 
\[
	\angle \input[s2v1]{} = \angle N 
\]
and 
\[
	\angle Q = \angle \input[s2v2]{}
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": " 
So, we have
\[
	\Delta MPQ \sim \Delta MNO 
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{PQ }{NO } = \frac{MP }{MN }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{PQ }{\input[s4v1]{}} = \frac{\input[s4v2]{}}{6 + 3 }
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow PQ = \input[s5v1]{} cm
\]
\newline"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": ["M", "P"], "text": "$$\text{From Thales' Theorem, we can write $\frac{MQ }{QO } = \frac{MP }{PN }$, which equals $\frac{6 }{3 } = 2.0$}$$"}, {"data": ["P", "O"], "text": "$$\text{Corresponding angles of a parallel line are equal, therefore, $\angle P = \angle N$ and $\angle Q = \angle O$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}, {"data": [10, 6], "text": "$$\text{As ratios of corresponding sides of similar triangles is proportional, therefore, $\frac{PQ }{NO } = \frac{MP }{MN }$, and after putting values we get $\frac{PQ }{10 } = \frac{6 }{6 + 3 }$}$$"}, {"data": [6.67], "text": "$$\text{Upon solving we get $PQ = 6.67 $ cm.}$$ "}]
